title: Understanding IEP and IFSP
text: An Individualized Education Program (IEP) is designed for students in school settings, while an Individualized Family Service Plan (IFSP) is for younger children, typically under the age of $$3$$, and focuses on family and early intervention services.

title: Age and Education Level
text: Consider Michelle's age and educational setting. Is she in a school environment or an early intervention program?

hintAnswer: an IEP team, because she is in high school
title: Identifying the Correct Team
text: Based on Michelle being in high school, which team is appropriate for her educational needs?
choices: an IEP team, because she is in high school
an IFSP team, because she is in high school
an IEP team, because she is in college
an IFSP team, because she violates others' personal space
